A Residential Construction Company Who Obsess Over Every Detail

Residential Construction – Whether you are the client/homeowner, a realtor, a private equity or real estate investor, Opus One Design Build is here to help you make your residential project a successful investment. Understanding that a home is a place where memories will be created and shared, we endeavor to provide a sturdy foundation (pun intended!) from which these memories can be cultivated. In addition to delivering homes of unparalleled quality, we provide a client-focused experience throughout the entire project. This relationship-based approach is founded on a desire to customize the construction process to the needs of each individual client. Your involvement in the process is paramount and our goal is that the experience you have while working with us is as spectacular and rewarding as the finished product we deliver.

North America’s Leading Home Builder & Renovation Expert Since 2012 See Our Testimonials

Our Clients have engaged us in the following areas:

  • New Home Construction
  • Home Renovations/Remodels
  • Custom Kitchens and Bathrooms
  • Turn-Key Construction/Remodel
  • Investment Remodels
  • Cost consultation
  • Complete project management
  • Architectural services
  • Interior Design
  • Landscaping Design
  • Engineering services
  • Blueprint production, input and/or reading
  • Structural design and execution
  • Permit application process oversight
  • Committee of Adjustment process oversight
  • Sourcing, selection and management of all applicable trades


We understand that construction and renovation projects can be large investments and scary endeavors. To facilitate our clients’ due diligence process, we offer a complimentary, no-obligation, on-site consultation. Contact Us For More Information

Getting Your Residential Construction Project Started

We encourage those considering a project in the next 3-12 months to contact us so that we may determine, via a brief telephone conversation with one of our Project Managers, whether an in-person visit makes sense. If it does, an onsite consultation will be scheduled with one of the members of our team. Our consultations typically last approximately one hour and require the property owner(s) to be present, along with any additional decision makers who will be involved with the project. The meetings are friendly, informal and interactive experiences. Our Project Manager will do a walk-through of the property with you, and will then sit with you to discuss options, preferences, timing, and to answer any questions you may have. Thank you for considering Opus One Design Build. Contact us here to get started.
